definitions.820-2936: What is 820-2936? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - No Wifi, has Bluetooth
threads.message:
<CAPACITOR>C3420</CAPACITOR> looked bad and I replaced L3404 while I was there.
<TRANSISTOR>Q3450</TRANSISTOR> measures okay.

I'm sort of just poking around hoping to stumble onto something as everything looks good.

Can anyone give any suggestions?

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - No Wifi, has Bluetooth
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - No Wifi, has Bluetooth
